# visibleRect

**Instance Property**

The currently visible rectangle, in the coordinate space of the scrubber content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var visibleRect: NSRect { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSZeroRect] if the layout is not currently assigned to a scrubber control.

## Configuring a scrubber layout

- **layoutAttributesClass**: A property containing a class that describes layout attributes.
- **scrubber**: The scrubber control that this layout is assigned to.
- **invalidateLayout()**: Signals that the layout has been invalidated, and that the scrubber control should perform a new layout pass.
